duties_responsibilities.duty: Understand and contribute to the design and sales process for large-scale automation systems and machinery.
Engage with customers to gather requirements and feedback, providing technical support and solutions.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and test custom automation solutions.
Contribute to the overall product design, ensuring functionality and efficiency.
Provide technical expertise and product knowledge to support the sales process.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
